text:
Kevin Federline blamed his ex Britney Spears for his weight gain.

Though he blamed his weight gain mostly on his depression, he also hinted at the fact that his split from Britney also had something to do with it.

"Everybody knows what happened with me and Brit. I'm not going to say that's the total cause of it but, I mean, just not being happy with myself was probably the main part of my depression," he said.
title: Celebrities Who Blamed Their Weight Gain on Their Spouses
